also spoke a parable to them that they must always pray, and not give up, "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"2"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"2"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"2"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"saying, was a judge in a certain city who didn’t fear God, and didn’t respect man. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"3"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"3"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"3"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"A widow was in that city, and she often came to him, saying, ‘Defend me from my adversary!’ "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"4"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"4"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"4"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"He wouldn’t for a while, but afterward he said to himself, ‘Though I neither fear God, nor respect man, "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"5"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"5"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"5"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"yet because this widow bothers me, I will defend her, or else she will wear me out by her continual coming.’” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"6"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"6"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"6"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"The Lord said, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"The Disciples","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["The Disciples"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"6"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“Listen to what the unrighteous judge says. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"7"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"7"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"7"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Won’t God avenge his chosen ones, who are crying out to him day and night, and yet he exercises patience with them? "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"8"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"8"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"8"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"I tell you that he will avenge them quickly. Nevertheless, when the Son of Man comes, will he find faith on the earth?” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"9"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"9"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"9"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"He spoke also this parable to certain people who were convinced of their own righteousness, and who despised all others. "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"Those Concerned","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["Those Concerned"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"10"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"10"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"10"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“Two men went up into the temple to pray; one was a Pharisee, and the other was a tax collector. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"11"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"11"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"11"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"The Pharisee stood and prayed to himself like this: ‘God, I thank you, that I am not like the rest of men, extortionists, unrighteous, adulterers, or even like this tax collector. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"12"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"12"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"12"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"I fast twice a week. I give tithes of all that I get.’ "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"13"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"13"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"13"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"But the tax collector, standing far away, wouldn’t even lift up his eyes to heaven, but beat his breast, saying, ‘God, be merciful to me, a sinner!’ "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"14"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"14"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"14"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"I tell you, this man went down to his house justified rather than the other; for everyone who exalts himself will be humbled, but he who humbles himself will be exalted.” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"15"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"15"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"15"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"They were also bringing their babies to him, that he might touch them. But when the disciples saw it, they rebuked them. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"16"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"16"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"16"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Jesus summoned them, saying, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"The Disciples","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["The Disciples"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"16"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“Allow the little children to come to me, and don’t hinder them, for the Kingdom of God belongs to such as these. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"17"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"17"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"17"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Most certainly, I tell you, whoever doesn’t receive the Kingdom of God like a little child, he will in no way enter into it.” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s Jesus heard these things, he said to him, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"A Rich Young Man","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["A Rich Young Man"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"22"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“You still lack one thing. Sell all that you have, and distribute it to the poor. You will have treasure in heaven. Come, follow me.” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"23"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"23"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"23"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"But when he heard these things, he became very sad, for he was very rich. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"24"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"24"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"24"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Jesus, seeing that he became very sad, said, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"The Crowd","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["The Crowd"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"24"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“How hard it is for those who have riches to enter into the Kingdom of God! "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"25"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"25"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"18","verse":"25"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"For it is easier for a camel to enter in through a needle’s eye, than for a rich man to enter into the Kingdom of God.”
